segments.Segment: i was so excited to see the concert
but it was postponed until next year
my mom told me she would be home by five
but she is still not here at six
i was surprised when my teacher
gave me an a on my test
the news about the
natural disaster is devastating
my brother took my video
game controller and broke it
i cannot believe i
failed my math test
i just found out that my favorite band is coming
to town and i am totally stoked
my dog ran away
and now i am feeling really upset
i was so startled
when the door slammed shut
when i saw the snake in the
grass i jumped and screamed
my dog ran away but
luckily we found him a few hours later
i just saw
a cute puppy
i was so scared to go skydiving
but it turned out to be an amazing experience
the haunted house was so scary
i almost peed my pants
the test was way harder than i thought it would
be and now i am worried i failed
the roller coaster was so much fun but then
i rode it again and it made me sick
my dog just ran away
and now i am really worried
my friend borrowed my favorite video game
and now it is broken
i got invited to a party this weekend
but i do not have anything to wear
my friend invited me to a party but then she texted
me that it was a joke and i felt so embarrassed
my cats death
made me feel sad
my cat is really sick and
i am really worried about him
my dog is so cute
he always puts a smile on my face
the haunted house was really scary but the
actor who jumped out at me was kind of hot
my mom is going to be mad when
she finds out i broke the vase
i hate it when my mom tells me what to wear
but i guess she is just trying to help
the roller coaster was so fun but then
it suddenly stopped and now i am terrified
i was so excited for the concert but when i
got there i realized i had left my tickets at home
my teacher gave me a surprise pop quiz and i was
not prepared but i am proud of myself for doing well
i got a new job offer and i am really happy
about it but the commute is going to be terrible
i woke up late for work and had to speed
to get there on time but i got a flat tire
my friend just told me a joke that
was so funny it made me laugh out loud
i just saw a
snake in the park
i just saw a spider crawling across my
desk and it freaked me out
my teacher gave me a lot of
homework and now i am stressed
i saw a snake in my backyard
and it totally freaked me out
my cat loves to sit on my lap while
i am studying but it is really distracting
my little brother is being really annoying right now
and i am starting to get mad
the beach was beautiful
and had such clear water
the teacher gave me a really hard math problem
and i do not know how to do it
the cake was delicious
but also very rich
the cashier gave me a rude look
when i tried to pay with a card
my friend told me a joke that was
so funny that i spit out my drink
i love
watching the sunset
my cat wakes me up every morning
by pouncing on my face
the haunted house was so scary that
i did not even want to go inside
my dad told me
to clean my room
i hate public speaking but
i guess it is important for my career
i was angry that my
brother took my video game
i was watching a scary movie but then i
saw a spider crawling on the wall and i freaked out
my mom was so mad at me for breaking
the vase but i did not mean to
my brother lied to me again
i do not know why i am still surprised
i got an a on my math test
but the teacher took off points for bad handwriting
i was so excited to try skydi
ving but i chickened out
my friends joke was really funny
but it also made me a little uncomfortable
i am so glad
i finally finished that project
the traffic jam caused me
to be late for work
my boss just gave me a promotion
and i am really excited about it
i cannot believe i won the lottery i am so excited
but i know i have to be careful with my winnings
i studied hard for the test but
i am still worried that i am going to fail
i had a fun
time at the arcade
my crush just
asked me out
i just saw the
funniest video ever
i just saw a snake in my backyard
and it scared me so much
i cannot believe i finally got tickets to see my favorite band but
they are playing on a tuesday and i have work the next day
my brother borrowed my car without asking and returned it with a dent
ed fender but he also left a gift on my doorstep as an apology
my little brother is always getting into trouble
and it is really stressing me out
the line for the bathroom is
now moving at a snails pace
i just found out
my favorite show is canceled
my little brother threw a tantrum in the middle of the grocery store
because he wanted a toy but my mom would not buy it for him
the roller coaster was really fun
but it also made me feel a bit sick
my teacher gave me a really hard math
problem in front of the whole class
my friend cancelled our plans at the
last minute which really annoyed me
the movie
was really scary
i saw a snake on my
hike and it startled me
the joke
was so funny
my dog loves to play with his toys but
sometimes he gets really carried away and starts barking loudly
the amusement park ride
made me really dizzy
the roller coaster was really fun
but also kind of terrifying
the clown at my brothers birthday party was
creepy and made me feel uncomfortable
i was expecting a raise
but my boss gave me a lecture instead
i saw a
beautiful rainbow yesterday
my friend surprised me with a visit but
i was not prepared and now i feel embarrassed
i just saw a video of
a puppy learning how to surf
my cat is so cute but sometimes
she scratches the furniture and it makes me angry
i just found out that my favorite
book is being turned into a movie
the movie was terrible
and i was disappointed
i was surprised when my
dog learned how to do tricks
i am so sad
that my grandma passed away
i saw a snake in the grass
and jumped back in fright
my little brother just
broke my favorite toy
my little brother is so
cute when he is sleeping
my friend surprised me with a birthday cake
but i am on a diet
i am so excited for
my upcoming vacation to hawaii
my best
friend moved away
my teacher just gave me a really hard assignment
and now i am feeling stressed and anxious
i am so nervous
about my upcoming job interview
my cat jumped onto my lap and started
purring it was really cute
my boss gave me a compliment in front of my
coworkers i felt embarrassed but also proud
the joke was really funny
but it was also a bit offensive
my brother always eats my favorite
snacks it is so frustrating
the test was much harder than i expected
but i think i did okay
my best friend just moved away
and i am really sad about it
my dog loves to
play fetch in the park
i was so nervous for my job interview but
i think it went well and now i am hopeful
my cat just
knocked over my water
my friend gave me
a really nice gift
the cashier at the grocery
store was so rude to me
the concert was amazing
i am so glad i went
i found out my
favorite restaurant is closing
my friend just told me a secret
but i promised not to tell anyone
i was so excited to see my crush
but he did not even notice me
my brother always takes the last slice of pizza
and it really ticks me off
i saw a hilarious
video on youtube last night
the roller coaster was so much fun
but the line to get on it was incredibly long
the test
was really difficult
i was so scared watching
that horror movie last night
i am so nervous
for my upcoming presentation
i was surprised when my teacher gave me a compliment on my essay but then
i realized that it was a mistake and she meant to give it to someone else
my mom surprised me with
a new bike for my birthday
the traffic jam was terrible but
at least i had a good book to read
my teacher just gave me a surprise pop
quiz and i am really nervous
i am so excited to see my crush but
i am also super nervous that i will say something stupid
my cat scratched me
and now i am bleeding
i was surprised when my boss gave me a raise
but now i am worried about the extra responsibility
my brother was really happy that
he got an a on his test
i saw a spider crawling on my arm
while i was driving on the highway
the clown at the
birthday party was creepy
my cat woke me up at 5 am and i
had to feed him but at least he is adorable
the teacher gave me a surprise pop
quiz and i was not prepared
i am so excited for my upcoming birthday party
but i am worried no one will show up
i am so done with this rain it is
been pouring all day and now my shoes are soaked
my dog ran away
and never came back
my friend told me a joke that was so
funny i snorted coffee out of my nose
i won a prize in a
contest and was thrilled
i woke up late and had to run
to class but i made it just in time
i finally finished that project but now i
am worried that i did not do a good enough job
my cat was sleeping on my lap
but then suddenly jumped up and startled me
my friend surprised me with a birthday party
but i had to leave early because of work
my friend borrowed my book
and lost it
my teacher assigned us a project over the weekend
and now i have to spend my entire saturday working on it
my brothers teasing
made me angry
i saw a snake in the park
and it scared the living daylights out of me
my mom told me that i have to clean my
room and i do not want to do it
i just saw a snake in the grass
and it startled me now i am shaking
my brother is so annoying he always
tries to bug me when i am trying to focus
i love surprises and
my surprise party was the best
the haunted house was so
scary i screamed
my boss just gave me a promotion but now i have to
work longer hours and i am not sure if it is worth it
my friend told me a secret
but then she denied it
i just saw a video of
a puppy who learned how to drive
my mom told me i could have ice cream
for dessert but then she changed her mind
my friend invited me to a party but i do
not want to go because i do not have anything to wear
i just saw a great concert but it
was really loud and now my ears are ringing
my cat loves to cuddle
but sometimes he gets too clingy
my mom told me that she is
taking me to the zoo this weekend
i am so excited to go to the beach this
weekend but i am worried it might rain
my brothers apology
made me feel relieved
i just saw a
proposal in real life
i think i left my phone in
the restaurant i am so annoyed
my friend just told me a secret that totally shocked me
but i am not sure if i should believe it
the haunted house was
way too scary for me
my cat was so happy to see me
that he purred and rubbed against my leg
i love playing video games
but i am bad at them
i cannot believe i won the lottery
i am going to buy a house on the beach
i cannot believe he
would say that to me
i hate it when my mom calls me during work hours
but i guess she just wants to check in
i saw a snake in the bathroom
but it was just a rubber snake
my brother lied to me and
now i do not know what to do
my favorite song came on the radio
it totally made my day
my friend told me a secret
and now i feel guilty for not telling anyone
my mom is so annoying she
always nags me about my homework
my brother is
such a showoff
i just saw a spider crawling across the
floor and it freaked me out
i am so excited
for my upcoming birthday
i found out my dog could
sing and it was hilarious
my brother teased me relentless
ly when we were kids
my brother lied to me
and now i do not trust him
i just saw a snake in the
park and it totally startled me
i am so done with this rain
but at least it is not snow
my brother surprised me
with a birthday party yesterday
my mom always tells me to wear a jacket when
i go outside but i hate carrying it around
i was expecting a raise
but instead i got laid off
i finally got my drivers license
but i am nervous about driving on the highway
my teacher gave me a surprise pop quiz and
i did not study now i am really nervous
i was supposed to meet my friend at the park
but i forgot and now i feel terrible
i was so excited to see my friends at the party
last night but they ended up not showing up
my little brother
broke my favorite toy
the roller coaster was amazing but
it made me a little nauseous
i accidentally spilled coffee on my shirt
and now i am in a bad mood
i am so excited to go on vacation next week
but i am also a little nervous about flying
the movie was so good
that i did not want it to end
i am so angry that i lost my favorite
earring it is just not fair
i finally got the job offer i
am so relieved it took long enough
i just saw a snake in the parking lot
i froze and did not know what to do
my friends ditched
me at the mall
